          <title>
            <string language="es">Monedas trucadas y distribución binomial</string>
            <string language="en">Trick coins and binomial distribution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trickmünzen und binomiale Verteilung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pièces de monnaie de tour et distribution 
binomiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moedas do truque e distribuição binomial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Monete di trucco e distribuzione binomiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νομίσματα τεχνάσματος και δυωνυμική διανομή</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva del lanzamiento de monedas simultáneamente, trucadas o no, calculando frecuencia y gráficas</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation of the simultaneous tossing of normal or trick coins which calculated frequencies and graphs</string>
          </description>

            <string language="es">estadística</string>
            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <structure>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation des simultanen 
Werfens der Normal- oder Trickmünzen, die Frequenzen und 
Diagramme errechneten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive du lancement en l'air 
simultané des pièces de monnaie de normale ou de tour qui ont 
calculé des fréquences et des graphiques</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação interativa de lançar simultâneo das 
moedas do normal ou do truque que calcularam freqüências e 
gráficos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva dello sballottamento 
simultaneo delle monete di trucco o di normale che hanno calcolato le 
frequenze ed i grafici</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση της ταυτόχρονης ρίψης των 
κανονικών ή νομισμάτων τεχνάσματος που υπολόγισαν τις συχνότητες
και τις γραφικές παραστάσεις</string>
          </description>
